title: Algorithmic Trading Bot
description: Automated trading system for analyzing market data and executing rule-based strategies
longDescription: A Python-based algorithmic trading system that fetches real-time and historical market data, applies technical strategies, and generates trade signals. Includes backtesting, risk management rules, and Telegram alert integration for trade updates.

title: Telegram Automation Bot
description: Advanced Telegram bot for group management, alerts, and automated replies
longDescription: A scalable Telegram bot built using Python that manages groups, sends automated replies, deletes service messages, maps users to groups, and delivers real-time alerts. Designed with admin-only commands and modular architecture.

title: Web Scraping & Automation Suite
description: Browser automation and data extraction system using Playwright
longDescription: Automation framework for scraping dynamic websites, handling authentication flows, managing sessions, and exporting structured data. Used for monitoring prices, extracting leads, and automating repetitive web tasks.

title: Full-Stack Portfolio Platform
description: Modern developer portfolio built with dynamic JSON-driven content
longDescription: A fast, responsive portfolio website built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. All content is driven by JSON files for easy scalability. Includes SEO optimization, dark mode, animations, and reusable components.

title: REST API Backend System
description: Secure and scalable REST API for managing application data
longDescription: Backend system built with FastAPI featuring authentication, role-based access, pagination, and API documentation. Designed for scalability and clean separation of concerns.
